author: Bruno Blanes
name: PatchNotesParser
description: A set of useful commands for parsing League of Legends patch notes.
short: A League of Legends patch notes parser.
install_msg:
Thanks for installing PatchNotesParser! XD

This COG stores a dictionary of strings in a separate file called `designer_icons.json`.
It also requires the following libraries to work: `bs4, typing, requests, rivercogutils` (https://github.com/RheingoldRiver/rivercogutils) and `river_mwclient` (https://github.com/RheingoldRiver/river_mwclient).
It is necessary for it to do a few GET requests to https://leagueoflegends.com and https://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com to get all the data needed for parsing.

To parse use `[p]pnparser parse all <patch_notes_version>` or type `[p]pnparser help` to see all available commands.
